main.name: Randall Burgess
main.description: I will soon be completing the web development boot camp program at UW!  For weeks now I have been training alongside my fellow students to put together one of the most sought after skill sets, currently on the job market.  I have found a strong passion for coding, and am ever excited to develop more programming skills.  It is my intention to make a career out of coding, so feel free to reach out to me with any job offers, or project contracts!
main.bio: I have had a life long passion for working with computers and new technology.  I have extensive experience working with computer and networking systems, and have recently put together a full stack web development skill set.  As long as I'm alive I want to be on the forefront of new technologies, and have made it my mission to be apart of the rapid growth our culture is currently experiencing.
main.contactmessage: I am always happy to talk about taking on new projects.  If you would like to reach out to me, please utilize one of the contact methods below.

resume.skillmessage: I am a full stack developer, I am currently utilizing the MERN stack, with MongoDB.

education.description: I am currently accruing enough credits to transer to a 4-year University in order to complete a CS degree.

work.title: Admissions Advisor
work.description: In my role at Trilogy, I was responsible for portraying the face of our bootcamp programs.  I spent my days speaking with students on the phone and building relationships to make sure we got people coming into our courses the best possible student experience.  I began in my role at Trilogy when it was a start up, and was integral in setting up office tech and network systems, as well as training and guiding new advisors.  I had spent time within the organization working with issues well out of my job description, and am always looking for other ways I could help the company be successful.

work.title: Field Technician
work.description: In my former position, I did PC repairs and networking for commercial and residential clients.  I was also responsible for scheduling calls for myself and other technicians, invoicing customers, speaking with our clients over the phone to assess their needs and general office work.

projects.title: D&D Character Generator
projects.category: A way to digitally represent a D&D character sheet

projects.title: ComiCall
projects.category: For comic searches big and small!

projects.title: Password Generator
projects.category: An app to generate apassword for you!

projects.title: Employee Tracker
projects.category: An app to catalogue and track your employees!

testimonials.text: Randy is single handedly the greatest developer I have ever met in my entire life.  He's also a fantastic saxophonist.
Hey everyone!  If you are looking for someone to make a great web app for you, look no further than Randall Burgess.  He built my web app, and fixed my roof.  Thank you, Randy.
